item.title: Best PVP Release- Bringing Fun Times Back!
item.dc:creator: @rova1 rova1
item.description:
@rova1 wrote:

EMINEM BEAST™:

dude upload this on mediafire or something ffs.

bullshitted my way through survey to download source, its completely untouched from original download in 1st post except:
-removed autorestarter.exe (false positive with av)
-removed character files and names/ip from ban lists

here you go:

source http://www.mediafire.com/?ejnvq6fsef0asz6

figured I’d get client too, just because of the hiscores buttons and shit, more lies and using some faggots email and phone number (wish i knew his address lol)

client http://www.mediafire.com/?8h3b9vzyyeit1r0
